name: Notice.AAA6.ClaimIssue.HWF.PartRemission
titleEn: Your help with fees application has been reviewed
titleCy: Mae eich cais am help i dalu ffioedd wedi cael ei adolygu
descriptionEn: You'll get help with the claim fee. ${claimIssueRemissionAmount} will be covered by fee remission. You must still pay the remaining fee of ${claimIssueOutStandingAmount}. You can pay by phone by calling {civilMoneyClaimsTelephone}.
descriptionCy: Byddwch yn cael help gyda ffi’r hawliad. Bydd y swm o ${claimIssueRemissionAmount} yn cael ei ddileu. Bydd rhaid i chi dal dalu’r ffi sy’n weddill o ${claimIssueOutStandingAmount}. Gallwch dalu dros y ffôn drwy ffonio {civilMoneyClaimsTelephoneWelshSpeaker}.
